body_html:
Hi Colin @craffel ,
I generated some alignments using LuongMonotonicAttention with mode='hard'
https://i.imgur.com/O7PJkmp.png
The output does not look like a binary image, is this the expected behaviour ?
Same code as above to obtain the alignment images, without any resizing

body:
Hi Colin @craffel ,
I generated some alignments using `LuongMonotonicAttention` with `mode='hard'`
https://i.imgur.com/O7PJkmp.png
The output does not look like a binary image, is this the expected behaviour ?
Same code as above to obtain the alignment images, without any resizing
